item.title: PICC: pragmatics of intellectual consumption and creation
item.description: There’s a better way to do it - Find it. Thomas Alva Edison Managing one’s intellectual appetite in these times where information (and - a lot of - noise) on any domain is available effortlessly and in vast amounts is quite an ordeal. Even though we have superior tooling and methods at our disposal to plough through these dense knowledge forests, coming up with the right set of tools for oneself is a commendable task in itself.
